snippet: Mr. Aburish, a former arms dealer with a Harvard M.B.A., skewered Arab leaders in his 11 books.
abstract: Said K Aburish, an American-educated Palestinian journalist who drew on his experience as an arms dealer in the Middle East to write 11 books on the region, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Aburish, a former arms dealer with a Harvard M.B.A., skewered Arab leaders in his 11 books.

headline.seo: Said K. Aburish, Palestinian Journalist, Is Dead at 77
headline.main: Said K. Aburish, Palestinian Journalist, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Said K. Aburish, Palestinian Journalist, Is Dead at 77
